title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle, Soy Wax Tin Candles, Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift

**Product Description:**

Indulge in the bliss of aromatherapy with our set of 16 small, portable soy wax tin candles, carefully crafted to provide a serene ambiance and a thoughtful gift for loved ones. Each candle is infused with high-quality essential oils and features a unique fragrance from our collection of 16 scents:

* Jasmine
* Rose
* Vanilla
* Bergamot
* Fig
* Lavender
* Lemon
* Spring
* Gardenia
* Strawberry
* Rosemary
* Peppermint
* Bluebell
* Wood Sage & Sea Salt
* Peony Cherry Blossom
* English Pear & Freesia

**Product Details:**

* Quantity: 16 candles
* Material: Natural soy wax
* Essential Oils: Yes
* Burn Time: 18-20 hours per candle
* Container Type: Recyclable tin cans
* Alternative uses for containers: Flowerpot, Home Decorations

**Safety Note:**

Please keep out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.

**Perfect Gift for:**

* Mother
* Wife
* Daughter
* Friend

**Order now and experience the tranquility and relaxation that our aromatherapy candles have to offer!**

Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle, Soy Wax Tin Candles, Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift

**Product Description:**

Indulge in the tranquility of aromatherapy with our set of 16 small portable gift candles, perfectly crafted for your loved ones. This thoughtful gift is suitable for Mothers, Wives, Daughters, and Friends, offering a unique way to show your appreciation and care.

**Product Details:**

* **Set of 16**: Each candle is carefully poured into a recyclable tin can, providing a total of 16 unique scents to enjoy.
* **Scented Candles**: Our candles feature a diverse range of 16 fragrances, including Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia.
* **Natural Soy Wax**: Made from high-quality, natural soy wax, our candles provide a clean and eco-friendly burning experience.
* **Essential Oils**: Infused with essential oils, our candles offer a truly aromatherapeutic experience, promoting relaxation and well-being.
* **Burn Time**: Enjoy 18-20 hours of burning time per candle, providing ample opportunity to unwind and recharge.
* **Tin Can Container**: The recyclable tin can container can be repurposed as a flowerpot or home decoration, reducing waste and encouraging sustainability.

**Safety Note:**

* Please keep the candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.

**Order now and show your loved ones you care!**

Indulge your loved ones with our beautifully crafted set of 16 small portable aromatherapy candles, perfect as a gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, or Friend. Each candle is carefully made with natural soy wax and infused with high-quality essential oils to provide a unique and uplifting experience.
